title: Albert Einstein
text: Albert Einstein was a German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity.

title: Isaac Newton
text: Isaac Newton was an English mathematician, physicist, astronomer, and author who formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation.

title: Marie Curie
text: Marie Curie was a Polish and naturalized-French physicist and chemist who conducted pioneering research on radioactivity.

title: Niels Bohr
text: Niels Bohr was a Danish physicist who made foundational contributions to understanding atomic structure and quantum theory.

title: Cooking Basics
text: This article is an unrelated piece about cooking techniques, recipes and food safety.
